name: 24s1-wdc-ug-group-3
description: **How to run the web application** 1. Clone the repository on the `main` branch. 2. Run `npm start` in the local IDE terminal. 3. Port 8080 redirects to the public landing page. 4. To switch to the Volunteer, Manager, or Admin interface, go to the 'Profile' icon in the top right corner and perform login.
